allow: Bash(cmd.exe /c "wmic process where ProcessId=29836 get Name,ProcessId,CommandLine")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add geographic pricing system \(Romania vs EU\)

- Add priceEU field to Variant model \(Prisma schema\)
- Create RegionProvider context with auto-detection from IP
- Add /api/geo endpoint for IP geolocation \(Vercel headers + ip-api.com fallback\)
- Add RegionSelector component with SVG flags in header
- Update ProductOrderForm to use regional pricing
- Update cart store with region support and price recalculation
- Update cart page to show region and recalculate on change
- Add SVG flag icons to language selector \(GoogleTranslator\)
- Include SQL migration script for priceEU column

Pricing: EU = RO price + 20%, currency remains RON

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: Change EU pricing to double \(x2\) instead of +20%

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add regional pricing \(RO/EU\) with EUR conversion

- Add region selector \(Romania/Europa\) with live price updates
- Implement Zustand store for region state management
- Add EUR conversion using BNR exchange rate API
- Create ProductCard and FeaturedProductCard components with regional pricing
- Add notranslate attributes to form elements to fix Google Translate issues
- Fix P16/P17 media URLs in database

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add auto-detection of region based on IP

- Create RegionAutoDetect component that calls /api/geo on first visit
- Automatically select EU for non-Romanian IPs
- Save detection flag to avoid overriding user''s manual selection

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
